name: User registration
description: Test is verifying that a user can do registration with specified fields.
descriptionHtml: Test is verifying that a user can do registration with specified fields.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: the request with body '{'username': 'russellburns', 'password': '!#rNAwLDw5', 'email': 'morenomary@example.com', 'firstName': 'Christopher', 'lastName': 'Thompson'}' returned status code: 200
assert 200 == 500
 +  where 200 = <Response [200]>.status_code
